# GitHub Actions Workflows

Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment workflows for ArbFinder Suite.

## Documentation

Workflow documentation has been moved to [docs/development/WORKFLOWS.md](../../docs/development/WORKFLOWS.md).

See the [Workflows Documentation](../../docs/development/WORKFLOWS.md) for detailed information about:
- CI/CD pipelines
- Automated testing
- Security scans
- Deployment workflows
- And more

For general CI/CD information, also see [docs/development/CI_CD_AUTOMATION.md](../../docs/development/CI_CD_AUTOMATION.md).
